name: test_e2e_with_logs[032_SQLI_BOOL_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_003` |
| **Name** | AND-based boolean injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND '1'='1`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%271%27%3D%271`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~54000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:34:32.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BOOL_003-1769859272964-rtj29o pattern_id=SQLI_BOOL_003 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%271%27%3D%271 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
